
<div class="post-container detail interaction">

                <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-arrow-left" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            </button>

            <div style="float: left">
                <div class="interaction-date">

                            3333 tokens
                        </span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="content-wrapper">
        <div class="prompt-display text-lg-left">
            What is this thing supposed to be?
        </div>

        <div class="post-description">
            <div class="response-display">
                Well, nobody is quite sure what anything is <i>supposed</i>? to do.
            </div>
        </div>

        <ul class="usage">
            <li class="usage-prompt">
                <b>prompt</b>
                <hr/>
                1001 tokens
            </li>
            <li class="operator">+</li>
            <li class="usage-completion">
                <b>completion</b>
                <hr/>
                2332 tokens
            </li>
            <li class="operator">=</li>
            <li class="usage-total">
                <b>total</b>
                <hr/>
                3333 tokens
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>



    <div class="container navbar-fixed-bottom" id="chat-controls" >

            <div class="form-row">
                <div class="form-group col-lg-2">
                    <select class="form-control text-light input-dark" name="persona">
                        <option value="RAW">Default Persona</option>
                        <option value="03b1fe">Sarcastic Cop</option>
                        <option value="742eac">Classic Libertarian</option>
                        <option value="a1f4b1">Concerned Parent</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group col-lg-10">
                    <input
                            type="text"
                            class="form-control text-light input-dark"
                            aria-label="chat prompt"
                            name="prompt"
                            hx-post="/interactions"
                            hx-target="#chat-content-root"
                            hx-indicator="#chat-loader"
                            hx-swap="afterend"
                            autofocus="true"
                            hx-ext="disable-element"
                            hx-disable-element="self"
                            placeholder="type something..."
                    />
                </div>
            </div>

    </div>
